name: unattractive
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
B2 unpleasant to look at: This is modern architecture at its most unattractive. He was short and overweight and generally unattractive. Synonyms
ghastly UK informal
grim (UNPLEASANT) informal
grotesque (UGLY)
hideous
ugly (NOT ATTRACTIVE)
unprepossessing
unsightly formal
C1 lacking good or positive features that make someone want to do something: All of the options were equally unattractive.
